metadata.name: handshake
metadata.description: A clean, modern, escrow-only Solana smart contract

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: Sender's token account to receive refund

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account to cancel (closed to sender)

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient's token account to receive funds

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account to claim (closed to sender on success)

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: pool_token_account
docs: Pool's token account where funds are stored

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account - PDA derived from sender, recipient, and nonce

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: Sender's token account to receive refund

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account to decline (closed to sender)

accounts.name: operator_token_account
docs: Operator's token account to receive funds

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: Sender's token account to receive refund

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account to expire (closed to sender)

accounts.name: mint
docs: The token mint this pool will handle

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account - PDA derived from pool_id

accounts.name: pool_token_account
docs: Pool's token account - where escrowed funds are stored

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool this transfer belongs to

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: Sender's token account to receive refund

accounts.name: transfer
docs: Transfer account to reject (closed to sender)

accounts.name: operator_token_account
docs: Operator's token account to receive fees

errors.name: TransferNotActive
errors.msg: Transfer is not in active status

errors.name: StalePoolValue
errors.msg: Pool value is stale and must be updated

errors.name: InvalidOperation
errors.msg: Invalid operation for this pool type

errors.name: OutstandingTransfers
errors.msg: Cannot reset pool with outstanding transfers

fields.name: operator
docs: Pool operator (can pause, close, withdraw fees)

fields.name: total_escrowed
docs: Current amount held in escrow (total_deposits - total_withdrawals - collected_fees)

fields.name: collected_fees
docs: Accumulated fees (can be withdrawn by operator)

types.name: PoolCreated
docs: Event emitted when a new pool is initialized
